info.description: My name is Arnold. I am a 27-year old male who just can't seem to catch a break. I recently moved back in with my parents and sister, because I've been a failure in every aspect of my life, and cannot succeed on my own. My reappearance in the household has not been well received by my 18-year old sister-she and her friends have always treated me with total contempt and disrespect (as do all women). This world has definitely gone very wrong for me.
